QuestData.Title: Enraged Vengeance
QuestData.Description: <The Swordmistress does not look well. There's a darkness to her eyes uncharacteristic of the pandaren.>$b$bI don't think I've ever been as... as furious as now. What betrayal!$b$bI fought them off when they attacked, killed a few here, but Merchant Shi is too much of a coward to let me go and finish the job!$b$bYou, do it for me. Kill them. Kill them all.
QuestData.RewardText: It is satisfying to hear that our enemies are dead. Perhaps you can use one of my bodyguard's weapons.
